clean_rotation_door.description: Clean the rotation door to remove any dirt.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob on the dishwasher.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob on dishwasher to start or set the cycle.

clean_dishwasher_body.description: Clean the dishwasher body to remove any stains or particles.

clean_entire_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher including the body, door, and knob.

operate_dishwasher.description: Operate the dishwasher by rotating the knob.
